titles.title: An original bill to authorize appropriations for the Federal Election Commission for fiscal year 1989.

calendar.text: Committee on Rules ordered to be reported an original measure.

action.text: Committee on Rules. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Ford. With written report No. 100-319.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 619.

bill.summary: 4/21/1988--Introduced. Amends the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to authorize appropriations for the Federal Election Commission for FY 1989.
